column12: SELF-RENEWAL OF NEURAL STEM CELLS IS PROMOTED BY WNT PROTEINS
column13: Mammalian neural progenitor or stem cells are expanded in vitro by culture in the presence of one or more wnt polypeptides. The expanded cells substantially maintain their original phenotype including the ability to give rise to multiple types of differentiated cells.
column15: NUSSE ROELAND;;KALANI M YASHAR S;;CHESHIER SAMUEL
